title.en: Lithuanian for Beginners II, Level A1.1 > A1.2
title.et: Leedu keel algtasemele II, tase A1.1 > A1.2

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

structural_unit_name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

description.en:
Since it is a follow-up course, previous basic knowledge of the language (A1.1) is required. Upon completion of the course, students are expected to reach a pre-intermediate level (A1.2). Assessment is on a pass/ fail basis.
During the course students expand both passive and active use of the language through a range of activities and exercises e.g. reading texts on a variety of topics and listening to dialogues.
Communicative approach is used in teaching speaking and listening skills. 
The topics covered during the course: 
- Home
- Weather
- Clothing
- Health 
- Work 
- Leisure and hobbies
Students are also given a brief overview of the main aspects of Lithuanian culture and everyday life.
description.et:
Kursuse jooksul omandatakse grammatika baasteadmised, loetakse erineva eesmärgiga tekste, kuulatakse dialooge, rääkimisoskust arendatakse kommunikatiivse meetodi baasil. Kursuse teemad:
- Kodu
- Ilm 
- Riided
- Tervis
- Töö
- Vaba aeg ja harrastused
Samas antakse lühiülevaade leedulaste tänapäevasest eluolust, tavadest ja kultuurist.
Kursus lõpeb arvestusega. Tegemist on jätkukursusega. Kursusel osalejatel eeldatakse A1.2 (pre-intermediate) taset.

objectives.en: Aim of the course is to develop students' skills of reading, writing, listening and speaking. Mastering of the basic garammar rules and vocabulary enlarging are included as well.
objectives.et: Kursuse eemärgiks on kõikide osaoskuste harjutamine ning arendamine (lugemine, kirjutamine, kuulamine, rääkimine), grammatika põhireeglite omandamine, sõnavara laiendamine.

learning_outcomes.en: The aim of the course is to develop all the four language skills: reading , writing, listening and speaking - as welll as to build up vocabulary and provide a core of the basic structures of grammar. After completing the course students will be able to read, understand and write simple texts.
learning_outcomes.et: Pärast kursuse läbimist on üliõpilased parandanud oma lugemis-, rääkimis- ja kuulamisoskust, nende leedu keele põhisõnavara on laienenud. Üliõpilased oskavad lugeda erinevaid lihtsamaid tarbetekste ning selliseid tekste koostada. Nad suudavad vestelda igapäevastel teemadel.

grade_preconditions.et:
1) kodused tööd
2) 5 kontrolltööd (positiivne tulemus on vähemalt 51% õigeid vastuseid)
3) kohalkäimine 85%

resources.recommended_materials:
1. E. Petrasiuniene, A. Valanciauskiene, V. Naslenaite-Eberhardt, K. Jakaite-Bulbukiene, L. Vaskeviciene "Langas i lietuviu kalba" (Vilnius 2016)
2. R. Zukiene "Lietuviu kalba uzsienieciams: teorija ir praktika. Lithuanian Course for Foreigners: Theory and Practice" (VGTU leidykla Technika 2012)

name.en: Department of Languages of the Asian Region

description.et: 1. nädal: kursuse sissejuhatus. "Ar tu studijuoji, ar dirbi?"
